rPrepare0:

You are cute kitties team and only you can fight these bold robots!

Press the button when you ready!
rPrepare1:
Please, give the phone to the robots team. 

You are brave robots team and there is your chance to show who is boss there!

Press the button when you ready!
rRules:
Russian hat is a team game for funny company where you have to find out who are better - kitties or robots.

Main point - to explain words and to guess them.

Rules:
Firstly you have to split into two teams: robots and kitties. Two persons in each team as minimum.
Choose one teammate who will show other teammates word on screen. Other teammates have to guess this word. Teams play by turns. While first team plays second team must be silent and wait for turn. Be careful only 30 seconds for round.

Lead must use only gestures. No speaking or mooing! If word is guessed lead must push 'Ez! Next please!' button, get point and fetch next word. If your team can't understand word you can just skip it with 'No, impossibru!' button. In that case word returns to hat.

The game is over as soon as words over in hat. Team with maximum points wins.

Have fun!
